channel.title: 474 client, 459 gameframe - possible?
channel.description: Hey, I was wondering if it was possible to use the 459 gameframe with a 474 client because PJA is a glitchy (npc following and drop duping) and I want to keep the "classic" aspect of the 459 gameframe.. If you can either supply me a way to load the 459 gameframe into a 474 client OR tell me in wich file NPC following is, I'd really appreciate it :D

item.title: 474 client, 459 gameframe - possible?
